languages.text: "Госпожа Хейдари играет словами! Да, она ничего не требует впрямую, но намеки..."
"Mistress Heydari is quibbling over semantics! She may not demand anything directly, but she drops heavy hints..."
languages.original_text: "Госпожа Хейдари играет словами! Да, она ничего не требует впрямую, но намеки..."

languages.text: “海达利女士这是在强词夺理！或许她确实没直接要求过什么，但她会说出非常明显的暗示……”
languages.original_text: "Mistress Heydari is quibbling over semantics! She may not demand anything directly, but she drops heavy hints..."

traits.locale_text: “海达利女士这是在强词夺理！或许她确实没直接要求过什么，但她会说出非常明显的暗示……”
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: 「ミストレス・ヘイダリの言っていることは道理の通らぬ屁理屈です！彼女は、たしかに直接何かを要求することはないかもしれません。ですが、ほのめかしたことは…」
languages.original_text: "Mistress Heydari is quibbling over semantics! She may not demand anything directly, but she drops heavy hints..."

traits.locale_text: 「ミストレス・ヘイダリの言っていることは道理の通らぬ屁理屈です！彼女は、たしかに直接何かを要求することはないかもしれません。ですが、ほのめかしたことは…」
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: «¡La señora Heydari protesta por semántica! Aunque no exija nada directamente, lanza numerosas indirectas...».
languages.original_text: "Mistress Heydari is quibbling over semantics! She may not demand anything directly, but she drops heavy hints..."

traits.locale_text: «¡La señora Heydari protesta por semántica! Aunque no exija nada directamente, lanza numerosas indirectas...».
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: « Maîtresse Heydari joue sur les mots ! Elle n'exige peut-être rien directement, mais elle use de sous-entendus appuyés... »
languages.original_text: "Mistress Heydari is quibbling over semantics! She may not demand anything directly, but she drops heavy hints..."

traits.locale_text: « Maîtresse Heydari joue sur les mots ! Elle n'exige peut-être rien directement, mais elle use de sous-entendus appuyés... »
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "Herrin Heydari schwurbelt ganz schön herum! Es mag sein, dass sie nie etwas direkt verlangte, aber sie ließ bestimmte Andeutungen fallen ..."
languages.original_text: "Mistress Heydari is quibbling over semantics! She may not demand anything directly, but she drops heavy hints..."

traits.locale_text: "Herrin Heydari schwurbelt ganz schön herum! Es mag sein, dass sie nie etwas direkt verlangte, aber sie ließ bestimmte Andeutungen fallen ...
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "Üstat Heydari, gereksiz birtakım anlam bilimsel argümanlarda bulunuyor! Direkt olarak bir şey talep etmemiş olabilir ancak net imalarda bulunmakta..."
languages.original_text: "Mistress Heydari is quibbling over semantics! She may not demand anything directly, but she drops heavy hints..."

traits.locale_text: "Üstat Heydari anlam bilimsel gereksiz argümanlarda bulunuyor! Direkt olarak bir şey talep etmemiş olabilir ancak net imalarda bulunmakta..."
